speaker: kid
dialogue: (I entered the cafe and walked past the waitress and right up to Teddy). Teddy, I need help with a case.

speaker: kid
dialogue: (Theadore looks up at me, he must have seen the panic in my eyes.)

speaker: bear
dialogue: Oh, of course, please sit down.

speaker: bear
dialogue: What's wrong? It must be important because you've not spoken to me since you left the force.

speaker: bear
dialogue: Ah don't worry I'm just giving you a hard time, but I wonâ€™t lie, I did miss having some conversation to go with my coffee.

speaker: kid
dialogue: I need you to drop the case with the Mothfia. (Teddy stopped smiling and looked at me. I could see him running the numbers in his head. I see him thinking about all the times I've let him down, about all the favors I've asked him to do, about abandoning him.)

speaker: bear
dialogue: I'm gonna need a coffee and you get one for yourself as well.
